desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Reda
lore: A rare crystal that radiates scarlet light. It is an item required to evolve the mock Unit modeled after Reda even further. Just as Reda gathers the fragments of heroes' memories, this crystal is believed to hold the feelings she has experienced upon touching those memories. Rumor holds that Noel and Rhynt of the Summoners' Hall refined this crystal in such a manner that touching it can grant a glimpse of ancient heroes' memories.
name: Memory Spinel
